title: Raising MMR by duo queue
body: My MMR is pretty low atm. I'm gaining 16LP per win and losing around 18-20. I've decided to duo queue with a friend which is in the same division as me. We perform  very good together and still on a 6 win hot streak. But after 6 wins, I don't see my MMR raise, I still get the same amount of LP it's annoying because I used to get around 24 per win. I'm asking does duo winning streaks increase your MMR? Or do I have to go solo. Thanks! :)

replies.body: Duo Queueing raises your team's MMR which means you get matched against people who have a higher MMR than you. As for how that affects your LP per win, I feel like that's only for Solo Queue MMR, but don't quote me.
I think solo is the best way but duo takes  longer
